Darkvision (S2 Tran): Touched sees 60' in dark for 8 hr
Disintegrate (S6 Tran): R60' Target suffers 10d6+40 HP force, dusts if reduced to 0 HP (Dex neg) [+Level inflicts +3d6 HP]

Magic Notes:
Bend Luck: Spend 2 Sorcery Points to add or subtract 1d4 from target attack, ability, or save
Careful Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to protect 3 creature(s) from self spell
Controlled Chaos: Choose from 2 Wild Magic Surge effects
Distant Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to dbl spell range or touch at 30'
Draconic Presence: R60' Spend 5 Sorcery Points for aura that charms or frightens (DC 17 Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Elemental Adept (Cold): Cold spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Fire): Fire spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Affinity: +3 HP ancestry type damage on spells
Empowered Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to re-roll 3 spell damage dice
Extended Spell: Spend 1 sorcery point to dbl spell duration
Flexible Casting: Convert Sorcery Points to and from spell slots
Font Of Magic: Use 20 Sorcery Points/long rest
Heightened Spell: Spend 3 Sorcery Points for target Disadv on spell save
Quickened Spell: Spend 2 Sorcery Points to cast spell as bonus action
Sorcerous Restoration: Regain 4 Sorcery Points/short rest
Spell Bombardment: Add another die when maximum rolled on spell damage die 1/rd
Subtle Spell: Spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast w/out somatic or verbal components
Twinned Spell: Spend spell level Sorcery Points to add second target
Wild Magic Surge: 5% chance of random magic effect
